params.filename: Katee Owen - Radar Love Titty Dance_fulldance.mp4

widgets_values:
For long generations you can use either context options, or the original long gen method, which is activated when frame_window_size is smaller than total frames(num_frames). When using this method the window size stays constant, extra frames are generated in the case the last window is cut short.

When using context options, set num_frames and frame_window_size to be equal

Otherwise set frame_window_size to something the model is capable of doing normally, original default is 77, 81 seems to work too.

Original method is probably better for motion etc, and is faster, but the benefit of context windows is that it doesn't degrade over time on long clips.
Default frame_window_size is 81 with context options disabled.

She looks directly at the viewer making flirtatious faces and direct eye contact.
